cards.html:
Episode 1 of the Switchaboo podcast! Hooray!

In this episode, we talk about:

  • The recent Nintendo Direct and what we’re excited for
  • The Super Smash Bros for Nintendo Switch announcement and new movesets
  • Nintendo’s new warmth towards third party and indie developers
  • Crash Bandicoot is coming? Dark Souls is coming?!
  • Shovel Knight’s new expansion
  • Celeste
